channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to back his limits on birthright citizenship and upend how the 14th Amendment’s been interpreted for 125 years
item.description: Any decision on whether to take up the case probably is months away and arguments probably would not take place until the late winter or early spring.

item.title: U.S. revokes visa for Colombia’s president after he went to a protest and urged American soldiers to disobey Trump
item.description: During a protest Friday over the war in Gaza, he said “I ask all the soldiers of the United States' army, don't point your rifles against humanity" an...

item.title: Denmark reports drone sightings at military facilities as NATO warns Russia about violating airspace
item.description: In neighboring Germany, several drones were reported in the northern German state of Schleswig-Holstein, which borders Denmark, from Thursday into Fri...

item.title: Trump to meet with top congressional leaders Monday ahead of government shutdown deadline at midnight on Wednesday
item.description: Democrats, believing they have leverage, have insisted on key health care provisions in exchange for their votes.

item.title: Entrepreneurs can make up to 70% more than paid employees per year, but there’s high inequality among the self-employed
item.description: But "the typical dollar in self-employment does not come from the typical self-employed individual," according to a Minneapolis Fed study.
